caption: Figure 4: Result of Explicit Perceptual Evaluation across three embodied scenarios. Scores in each embodied scenario are normalized to 0-1. The abbreviations are listed in Tab. 2.
description: The radar chart visualizes the performance of multiple video generation models across different evaluation dimensions within three embodied scenarios.

caption: Figure 5: Result of Implicit Manipulative Evaluation across three embodied scenarios.The abbreviations are listed in Sec. 4.2.2.
description: The chart displays the results of Implicit Manipulative Evaluation across three scenarios (Open-Ended Embodied Environment, Autonomous Driving, and Robot Manipulation), showing the performance of various video generation models on different tasks.
